summary:
THE SECOND VERSION OF THE MOST ENDORSED NON-ENB IMAGE ENHANCEMENT OF ALL TIME IS HERE.
-Dedicated to weak PCs.
-BRUTAL performance compared to even the lightest ENB.
-Silly and funny animation included LOL.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=6][color=#E36C09]ICBINE 3 IS OUT!!![/color][/size][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63839/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/SV5EkTv.png[/img][/url]
[size=5]MUST SEE TRAILER[/size]
[youtube]9i7jqJH6o4c[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/VbY9KQl.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/E987cms.png[/img]
[font=Impact][size=5][color=#00b050]REAL TRAILER[/color][/size][/font]
[youtube]4QeTtqczKLY[/youtube][youtube]_wupYDd3RG4[/youtube]
HI GUYS! THE SECOND VERSION OF [img]http://i.imgur.com/wf2OQCa.png[/img]IS FINALLY HERE!
THIS TIME I WORKED TO MAKE IT MORE REALISTIC BUT STILL BEAUTIFUL, AND AS REQUESTED BY MANY USERS, USING THE LATEST VERSION OF [url=http://forums.guru3d.com/showthread.php?t=381912]SWEETFX[/url] WHICH IS MORE POLISHED WITH A LIIIIIIIIITTLE MORE PERFORMANCE!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7rEkMB2.png[/img]

[size=2][color=#FF0000]READ THIS IF YOU DONT WANT YOUR ALREADY ANSWERED QUESTION DELETED INSTANTLY PLEASE:[/color][/size]

-THIS IS N-O-T AN ENB.
-B-R-U-T-A-L PERFORMANCE GAIN COMPARED TO EVEN THE LIGHTEST ENBs.
-COMPATIBLE WITH ANY M-O-D. [mods using similar methods are NOT compatible, I guess you should know what you are using by now]
[From what I readed its not compatible with dxtory, or programs like that....check the posts of the previous version]

[size=3][color=#FF0000]INSTALLATION: [/color][/size] just put this files inside Skyrim folder.
[size=3][color=#FF0000]UNINSTALLING: [/color][/size] just delete the files.

[size=2][color=#FF0000]FAQS[/color][/size]
-My skyrim crashes now! -> Not compatible with dxtory, or programs like that. [font=Impact][size=5][color=#ff0000]LAPTOP USERS GO TO THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE PLEASE.[/color][/size][/font]
-Fire its ts too red! -> Yeah, sorry :/
-It doesnt look like the screenshots! -> Calibrate your monitor/CoT has like 5 trillion different climates.
-Random question. -> ALREADY ANSWERED [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48554/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D48554%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1250444&pUp=1]HERE[/url]

[size=3][color=#FF0000]REQUIREMENTS[/color][/size]

-You can use it as it comes, didnt try it in vanilla Skyrim, some users told me it made the game look better anyway.
Why Im saying this? -> I use it with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url]

-I made this so you can use it without any image enhancing mods, but 50% of the time, people find something to tweak, so I STRONGLY RECOMMEND: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]IMAGINATOR[/url]
With those 2, you can quickly tweak colors/lighting/sky/contrast and a few more things.
I MADE THOSE SCREENSHOTS WITH THIS SETTING:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Dbb0A1A.png[/img]

[size=3][color=#FF0000]You see in the screenshots mountains/water/fire/monsters/sunglare/snow/ice/stars/nebula, etc that you like?
No need to ask, here are the links:[/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35631/?]MONSTER MOD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/116/?]SUNGLARE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5473/?]BUMP SNOW[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]WATER[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45435/?]IMMERSIVE SNOW AND ICE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47439/?]EAGLE NEBULA[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7308/?]SKILL INTERFACE RETEXTURE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85/?]ENHANCED NIGHTS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ENHANCED LIGHTS AND FX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]ULTIMATE FIRE EFFECTS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38472/?]ELIZABETH TOWER[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23870/?]BROWN MOUNTAINS[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51750/?]WEATHER CONTROL CENTER[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50316/?]REFRACTING ICICLES[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]IMMERSIVE CREATURES[/url]

[size=3][color=#FF0000]OK...SO YOU WANT EVEN MORE PERFORMANCE WITH NO QUALITY LOSS? OK....HERE!!![/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5712421/?tb=mods&pUp=1]GAMWICH TEXTURES[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6387/?]SKYRIM PERFORMANCE PLUS[/url]

[size=3][color=#FF0000]DO ME A FAVOR AND POST SOME SCREENSHOTS[/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33521/?]SCREENSHOT ASSIST[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/snZxHSP.gif[/img]
[font=Impact][size=4][color=#ffff00]YOU WANT THE VIGNETTE EFFECT TOO?????.....WOW DUDE...OK:[/color][/size][/font]
[font=Impact][size=4][color=#ffff00]
[/color][/size][/font]
[color=#92d050][font=Arial][size=2][b]JUST OPEN THE SweetFX_settings.txt FILE AND CHANGE:[/b][/size][/font][/color]

[color=#92d050][font=Arial][size=2][b]#define USE_VIGNETTE 0 //[0 or 1] Vignette : Darkens the edges of the image to make it look more like it was shot with a camera lens. May cause banding artifacts.[/b][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#92d050][font=Arial][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#92d050][font=Arial][size=2][b]( 0 IS OFF, 1 IS ON )[/b][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#92d050][font=Arial][size=2][b]
[/b][/size][/font][/color]
[color=#92d050][font=Arial][size=2][b]#define USE_VIGNETTE 1 //[0 or 1] Vignette : Darkens the edges of the image to make it look more like it was shot with a camera lens. May cause banding artifacts.[/b][/size][/font][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/P8g70wK.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/z79xoSe.png[/img]
[font=Impact][size=6][color=#ffc000]...AND ONE MORE THING!!!![/color][/size][/font]
[youtube]dXLCRmmT8JI[/youtube]

CREDITS: [url=http://forums.guru3d.com/showthread.php?t=381912]CEEJAY FROM THE GURU3D FORUMS!!![/url]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ok, from what I understand, this is not compatible with laptops...
...I made a little research and come with 2 interesting links for you to research.
Here's the part where it depends on you, Im not responsible for any change or whatever you do with your PC, you're on you're own here, sorry. NOT GONNA ANSWER ANY QUESTION RELATED TO THIS.

[color=#C0504D][size=4]------------------UPDATE, TRY THIS FIRST OF ALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!:[/size][/color]
Thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/9892239-andizzzzy/]Andyzzzzy[/url] for the link!
